PRIVACY POLICY Last Updated: February 18, 2026
1. Children’s Privacy This App is directed to children under 13. We comply with applicable child privacy laws including COPPA, GDPR-K, and relevant Israeli privacy regulations.\n
2. Information We Collect We collect minimal data necessary to operate the App, including:
- Device type and operating system - App usage statistics - Crash reports\n
This information does not directly identify a child.\n
3. Advertising We use Google AdMob to serve contextual ads. Personalized advertising is disabled for child-directed treatment. AdMob may collect limited device identifiers for fraud prevention and ad delivery.
4. AI Processing If images are uploaded:
- Images are processed to generate AI content. - Images are not sold. - Images are not used for advertising profiling.
5. How We Use Information We use collected data to:
- Operate and maintain the App - Improve functionality - Fix technical issues - Deliver contextual advertisements
6. Data Sharing We do not sell children’s personal information. We may share limited data with service providers such as Google AdMob and Firebase solely to operate the App.
7. Parental Rights Parents or guardians may request data access or deletion by contacting: Email: [your@email.com]
8. Data Retention We retain information only as long as necessary for app functionality or legal compliance.
9. Security We implement reasonable safeguards to protect data, but no system is completely secure.
10. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Updates will be reflected with a new “Last Updated” date.
